Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all completed features in a project

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on a project

Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the total story points completed within a single sprint

Name: minimize_task_effort
IsSum: in hours) for all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team completes per sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the sum of severity levels for all active blockers

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with high influence

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall duration of the project by bringing the end date forward

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction score from sprint retrospectives over time

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals (e.g., 1 for achieved, 0 for not)

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers
Description: Minimize the count of blockers that are not in a 'resolved' status

Name: maximize_features_in_release
Description: Maximize the number of features included in a single release plan
